content: 6 3 single_crochet increase around 9 4 single_crochet around 9 5 2 single_crochet increase around 12 6 single_crochet around 12 - f/o leave long tail for sewing legs x 4 - begin with light pink 1 work 5 single_crochet in a magic_ring 5 2 increase 4 single_crochet 6 3 increase 5 single_crochet 7 - f/o leave long tail for sewing copyright © 2025 icrochetthings 5/7 tail - begin with light pink 1 chain 6 skip 1st chain from hook 5 increase 10 - f/o leave long tail for sewing copyright © 2025 icrochetthings 6/7 assembly more pictures are included on the next page be sure to pay attention to where the spots on the body are oriented when sewing pieces on use gray yarn to embroider nostrils onto the snout sew the snout onto the head stuffing as you go sew the ears onto the top of the body stuffing as you go use brown yarn to embroider eyes onto the front of the body sew the legs onto the bottom of the body sew the tail onto the back of the body copyright © 2025 icrochetthings 7/7 copyright © 2025 icrochetthings
